metadata.dc:author: Montero García, C
Blasco Huelva, A
Alvarez Domínguez, J
Pando-Pinto, J
Torrico Román, P
metadata.dc:description: Primary extramedullary plasmacytoma (PEP) are malignant neoplasm of plasma cells. They are very rare, however 80% of the cases appear in head and neck region. We reported a rare case of PEP of the base of the tongue, in a 44-year-old male with oral bleeding.
metadata.dc:title: Plasmocitoma extramedular primario de base de lengua.
[Primary extramedullary plasmocytoma of the tongue base].
